title: BRIEF-True North Commercial Real Estate Investment Trust Announces $70 Mln Equity Offering
text:
BRIEF-True North Commercial Real Estate Investment Trust Announces $70 Mln Equity Offering

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 03, 2019 18:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-True North Commercial Real Estate Investment Trust Announces $70 Mln Equity Offering Sept 3 (Reuters) - True North Commercial REIT : * TRUE NORTH COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST ANNOUNCES $70 MILLION EQUITY OFFERING AND THREE POTENTIAL CLASS “A” URBAN ACCRETIVE ACQUISITIONS * TO SELL, ON A BOUGHT DEAL BASIS, 10.6 MILLION TRUST UNITS OF REIT AT $6.60/UNIT * INTENDS TO DEPLOY NET PROCEEDS FROM OFFERING TO FUND POTENTIAL ACQUISITION OF THREE CLASS "A" OFFICE PROPERTIES * POTENTIAL ACQUISITION PROPERTIES HAVE A COMBINED PURCHASE PRICE OF ABOUT $222.5 MILLION * VENDOR OF ONE OF POTENTIAL ACQUISITION PROPERTIES TO ACCEPT ABOUT $15.0 MILLION OF TRUST UNITS AS PARTIAL CONSIDERATION

BRIEF-True North Commercial Real Estate Investment Trust Announces $70 Mln Equity Offering
